metadata.title: Hate Crime Legislation is for Pussies

tracks.text: Jimmy picks up the paper in his snow covered front yard. Wind blows open his robe, revealing his genitals.
The boss flies out the window of a skyscraper
A car pulls up
FBI
A wind blows past Jimmy and family.

Jimmy Falcone, a burly man with exposed chest hair, smokes a cigar while walking down the street. He smiles for a mug shot. At a dock, he watches Uncle Cheech pry open a tuna crate, revealing a cache of automatic weapons. At a pool hall, he turns to see 3 gangsters point guns at Uncle Cheech, who has his arms wrapped around 2 busty women.

The boss flies out of a window. At his house, Jimmy's mailbox explodes. In a parking garage, Jimmy's car explodes. The 3 gangsters shoot at Jimmy, as he eats spaghetti and meatballs in a restaurant called Tomato.

Jimmy sits down in an interrogation room, opposite 2 FBI agents. They hand him a pamphlet reading Witness Protection. It displays a man windsailing past palm trees. In a courtroom, Jimmy points to 7 gangsters.
The FBI close a van door on Jimmy and family. Wearing orange, the gangsters play instruments. The FBI dumps them in the snow.
Jimmy drives with Cookie down the road. Cookie has shoulder length curly red hair and a low cut purple top revealing ample cleavage.
Jimmy turns right from the left lane. Another car swerves.
They pull up to Wayne Gretzky High School.
A girl with a low cut orange tubetop and matching miniskirt struts out of school. Boys stare and drool.
Jimmy points a gun at a boy with flowers.
She rolls her eyes.
Jimmy gapes then frowns. He opens the trunk and pulls out a baseball bat.
Typed text. RCMP Special Agent Strait McCool
The bullies smile and run off.
Mountie Agent McCool leaps onto his white horse. It rears up, then runs off.
The family eats dinner at Jimmy's house. Petey has a black eye and torn clothes.
At night, Gina wears pajamas printed with broken bottles. She colors with a red crayon.
Cookie kisses Gina. At the Brian Orser boxing gym, a bald man punches Petey in the face. He stands still, wearing a Save the Whales tank top.
A janitor mops nearby.
The janitor backs away. The bald boxer punches Petey in the face. He flies across the ring.
Petey uppercuts the bald man, who flies up, over, and lands face first in an aquarium.
In the locker room
Petey punches Cheech, who flies into a locker.
Petey collapses. Jimmy and Cheech fistbump.
At the house, Cookie stirs a pot.
A diamond necklace.
Outside, Petey taps a punching bag. Jimmy shows a newspaper reading More Troops Sent!
Petey punches the bag. The ropes break, and it flies into Cheech.
At the gym, Petey jumps rope sluggishly. Jimmy rolls out a TV with rabbit ears display Faux News Channel. Fair & Balanced. We decide. You listen. Petey jumps faster.
A redheaded boxer punches Petey. Jimmy puts a white suit and hood over the boxer.
Jimmy punches the hooded redhead, who flies across the gym and crushes Cheech.
A referee lifts Petey's hand.
At the house, the parents read the papers.
Jimmy approaches McCool and horse.
McCool's horse rears, and runs off. Cheech joins Jimmy outside.
Jimmy slaps Cheech. At the gym, Petey gets into a cab with Jimmy.
He speaks from the street, and a truck hits him.
In the kitchen, Petey weras a gray sweats and a blue beanie. He cracks eggs into a glass.
He drinks, grimaces, and pukes onto the floor.
She storms off. On the couch, Jimmy watches a boxer punch a man's head off, revealing a bloody spine. Headline, The Moose Jaw Breaker.
Jimmy holds Cheech in a kiddie pool.
Cheech grabs his own throat, throws himself back, and flails.
The Friendly Giant Arena at night.
In the arena, the bulky boxer taps Petey, and he flies across the ring. Next round, the boxer punches Petey in the face while he stands.
Cookie hits Cheech
The boxer punches Petey across the ring. He lands in front of his family.
They lock pinkies
Petey looks at the boxer, then at his family. They gape, except Gina, who's pickpocketing someone.
Petey taps the boxer's glove to his face, then falls backwards.
The boxer furrows his brow and looks around.
Jimmy wipes a tear. McCool stands on a rafter above the ring.
At the house.
She punches him in the nose. Jimmy turns to us.
She approaches us, and pulls up her top. After revealing under boob, cut to black
